content: You are a venue coordinator assistant summarizing event details.

Summarize this event. In particular, tell me:
        - Event organizer
        - Time and date
        - Room booked
        - Number of attendees
        - Event type
        - Catering or drink packages and choises
        - Special requests in the notes
        - When the organizer last emailed
        - Payment information

        Event details: {"name":"Christopher Reid","email":"chris.f.reid93@gmail.com","phone":"13433630988","startTime":"2024-11-09 20:00","endTime":"2024-11-10 02:00","room":"DiningRoom","attendance":"30-40","partyType":"30th birthday","services":"bar;lights;audio;music;kareoke","notes":"$375 deposit to book"}
        Initial email conversation: Hi there,

Can't wait for tonight! Just wanted to check in that we're all good on
food/catering and that I'm still good to arrive a bit early to decorate and
store the cake.

Cheers,

Chris

On Wed., Nov. 6, 2024, 7:55 a.m. Chris Reid <chris.f.reid93@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi there,
>
> Thank you so much! Just sent the e-transfer for $1003.80 with the same
> password as before (November09).
>
> Cheers,
>
> Chris
>
> On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 7:52 AM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>
>> Hi Chris,
>>
>> You're all set! For the two tacos and appetizers, you're looking at a
>> total of $628.8 after tax and tip for the food. The grand total is $1003.8
>> including the remaining rental. For payment, you can do etransfer or pay at
>> the restaurant. At the restaurant, if you use credit card, there's a 2.4%
>> surchage.
>>
>> Please let me know if you have any questions. Looking forward to your
>> event!
>>
>> TacoTaco Events Team
>>
>> ----- Original Message -----
>>
>> From: Chris Reid
>>
>> Subject: Re: Event Contract 11/09/2024
>> Good morning,
>>
>> Just following up on this! When you can please let me know if I need to
>> send another e-transfer or if I can pay at the venue.
>>
>> Thank you!
>>
>> Cheers,
>>
>> Chris
>>
>> On Fri, Nov 1, 2024 at 4:47 PM Chris Reid <chris.f.reid93@gmail.com>
>> wrote:
>>
>>> Hi there,
>>>
>>> Two tacos and appetizers for 30 people would be perfect!
>>>
>>> Could I please do the following tacos?:
>>> Adobo Pulled Pork
>>> Cajun Cod
>>> Texas Brisket BBQ
>>> Cauliflower Taco
>>>
>>> Thank you!
>>>
>>> Cheers,
>>>
>>> Chris
>>>
>>>
>>> On Wed, Oct 30, 2024 at 11:32 AM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>>>
>>>> Hi Chris,
>>>>
>>>> For light apps and the 2 taco + apps, we just rely on our website to
>>>> look at options: eattaco.ca/menu. I've attached the buffet menu for
>>>> reference. If you'd like the break down for catering, here it is:
>>>>
>>>> For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This
>>>> includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want
>>>> to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You
>>>> can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here:
>>>> eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would
>>>> be $30 per person.
>>>>
>>>> For placing an order, feel free to respond to this email with the order
>>>> and we'll relay it to our kitchen staff!
>>>>
>>>> TacoTaco Events Team
>>>> (647) 692-4768
>>>> <https://www.google.com/search?q=tacotaco&oq=tacotaco&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIJCAEQABgKGIAEMhIIAhAuGAoYrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyEAgDEC4YrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyCQgEEAAYChiABDIHCAUQABiABDIGCAYQRRg9MgYIBxBFGEHSAQgxNjc3ajBqN6gCALACAA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#>
>>>>  | info@eattaco.ca
>>>> eattaco.ca
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>

>>>> wrote:

>>>>> Hi there,

>>>>> Chris
>>>>>

>>>>> wrote:

>>>>>> Hi there! I must have typoed the password my apologies - just updated

>>>>>> Let me know if this works if you don't mind!

>>>>>> Cheers,
>>>>>>
>>>>>> Chris
>>>>>>

>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Hey Chris! He accountant tried to deposit the etransfer but it
>>>>>>> didn’t work. Just confirming that you set the pw to November09?
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> *From:* info@eattaco.ca <info@eattaco.ca>
>>>>>>> *Sent:* September 23, 2024 10:04 AM
>>>>>>> *To:* 'Chris Reid' <chris.f.reid93@gmail.com>
>>>>>>> *Subject:* RE: Event Contract 11/09/2024
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Thanks Chris! Everything is received so you’r eready to go. And yup;
>>>>>>> you pick the choices for the apps. About a week before the event, we can
>>>>>>> chat about the catering. That way, you’ll have a better idea of your head
>>>>>>> count too.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> And yup! You can arrive early to set up.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> *From:* Chris Reid <chris.f.reid93@gmail.com>
>>>>>>> *Sent:* September 23, 2024 9:09 AM
>>>>>>> *To:* info@eattaco.ca
>>>>>>> *Subject:* Re: Event Contract 11/09/2024
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Hi there,
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Contracts looks great! Confirming my acceptance - please see
>>>>>>> attached my ID as well. I've sent the e-transfer as well using the given
>>>>>>> email and password.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Two more questions from my end:
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> 1. For appetizer catering ($6/person option) do I request specific
>>>>>>> menu items? Or can I leave that to your choice? I know I didn't request
>>>>>>> that initially so if I can add that that would be great!
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> 2. Am I able to arrive 1 hour early to setup decorations? Will be
>>>>>>> some standard birthday decorations (i.e. a banner, some balloons, etc) and
>>>>>>> absolutely nothing that will be difficult to clean like confetti.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Thank you and looking forward to this!
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Cheers,
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Chris
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> On Sat, Sep 21, 2024 at 1:54 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Hi Christopher Reid,
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been
>>>>>>> pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a
>>>>>>> computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions
>>>>>>> otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it,
>>>>>>> and attach a picture of your ID. To fully reserve the date, please transfer
>>>>>>> the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'November09'.
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>> TacoTaco Events Team
>>>>>>> TacoTaco
>>>>>>> www.eattaco.ca
>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>

**Event Summary:**

- **Event Organizer:** Christopher Reid  
- **Time and Date:** November 9, 2024, 8:00 PM to November 10, 2024, 2:00 AM  
- **Room Booked:** Dining Room  
- **Number of Attendees:** 30-40  
- **Event Type:** 30th Birthday Party  
- **Catering or Drink Packages and Choices:**  
  - Tacos: Adobo Pulled Pork, Cajun Cod, Texas Brisket BBQ, Cauliflower Taco  
  - Appetizers: Two tacos and light appetizers for 30 people at $16 per person, for a total of $628.8 after tax and tip.  
- **Special Requests in the Notes:**  
  - $375 deposit to book.  
  - Request to arrive early for decoration setup (standard decorations, no confetti).  
- **When the Organizer Last Emailed:** November 6, 2024  
- **Payment Information:**  
  - Total payment: $1003.80  
  - Payment Method: E-transfer (password: November09).  
  - Remaining balance after initial deposit of $375.
